title: Facebook is reportedly scaling back its podcasting plans
content:
In April last year, Facebook announced several new audio features, including audio chat rooms, podcasts, and sound bites to take on Clubhouse and Spotify. description: Facebook is scaling back on its push for podcasts and other audio experiences as it seeks to prioritize other initiatives.
